mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from CashBillReceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into CashBillReceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, accountID,total,itemList) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{accountId},#{total},#{itemList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler})
mapper.delete: delete from CashBillReceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from CashBillReceipt where createTime >= #{begin} and createTime <= #{end}
